title: Condition when C is assigned to grade

content.description: Consider the following code segment, where exam and presentation are integer variables and grade is a string variable.
content.question: IF((exam > 90) AND (presentation > 80)){grade <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> "A"}IF((exam > 80) OR (presentation > 75)){grade <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> "B"}ELSE{IF((exam > 70) OR (presentation > 60)){grade <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> "C"}ELSE{IF(exam > 60){grade <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> "D"}ELSE{grade <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> "F"}}}Under which of the following conditions will the value "C" be assigned to the variable grade ?

choices.label: When the value of exam is 70 and the value of presentation is 50
When the value of exam is 70 and the value of presentation is 80
When the value of exam is 80 and the value of presentation is 60
When the value of exam is 80 and the value of presentation is 80

content.answer: When the value of exam is 80 and the value of presentation is 60

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Determine the result of code segments.
